scheme_name: Health and Maternity Cover for the Construction Workers
State: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
details: The "Health and Maternity Cover for the Construction Workers" by the Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, U.T. Administration of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu, is a welfare scheme for the registered workers of the board. Under this scheme, registered beneficiaries of the board shall be provided maternity benefits in the form of financial assistance during the period of maternity.
benefits: Cash Benefits: ₹30,000/- per delivery for male members and ₹40,000/- per delivery for female members.
Other Benefits: Enrollment Under PM-JAY (Ayushman Bharat)
eligibility: The applicant should be a resident of U.T. Administration of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu.
The applicant should be a Building/ Construction Worker.
The applicant should be between 18 and 60 years.
The applicant should have engaged in any building or other construction work for at least 90 days in a given year.
Registered member Under the Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board of U.T. Administration of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu.
The applicant shall be eligible to avail the benefits only for their first 2 children.
application_process: Offline registration process as a Building/ Construction Worker:
Step 1: Application for registration is to be made in the prescribed form and is to be accompanied by prescribed documents and a fee of not more than ₹50/-.
Step 2: Application for registration has to be made to the officer authorized by the Board on this behalf.
Application Process of the Welfare Scheme:
Step 1: Any registered worker can make an application in the prescribed Form-II along with the mandatory documents (self attested, if required).
Step 2: Application shall be submitted to the Member Secretary (BOCWWB) for this benefit.
